resource_section: Distribution by ports of arrival (percentage) â€“ 2020
remarks: Dataset contains tourist arrival statistics by port of entry for 2020, showing the number of arrivals at each port. Columns: Port and Arrivals. Data includes 5 ports with Katunayake (Bandaranaike International Airport) having the highest arrivals (818,975), followed by Mattala Rajapaksa International Airport (14,406) and Colombo Harbour (26,816).
